price: Ata thanë: “Nëse nuk tërhiqesh nga këto, o Lut, me siguri do të jesh i dëbuar”.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
